name: DotDash
description:
DashDot is a score game and a mobile like game but with more post-processing layer. This satisfying game consist of rotation movements only to accumulate all foods and beat circle enemies.

HOW TO PLAY:

  1. Dodge Red Circles
  2. Touch Blue Circles
  3. Coin (Coming Soon for Shop Use)
  4. Use "D" and "A" to rotate.
  5. Enjoy the Game!
